website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Thrill 2, a neutral road running shoe, is a great choice when it comes to high comfortability, maximum durability and good performance on asphalt. It is an all-rounder shoe for people who are looking for a visually appealing footwear in an affordable price range.
pros: The majority of runners called Under Armour Thrill 2 a pair of optimally cushioned shoes
The users were impressed with the shoe’s lightweight nature
The wearers noted how highly breathable its upper was after it kept their feet amazingly dry during longer workout sessions
The purchasers seemed happy with the reasonable price of this running shoe
A few runners mentioned how their legs felt different in the shoe owing to its excellent underfoot cushioning system
The looks-conscious customers admired the overall design and color scheme of the Under Armour Thrill 2
A few runners happily highlighted how well the shoe held up, even after many running sessions
cons: A user returned his pair since he thought that the cushioning on the sole was inadequate

customer_reviews.title: Great sporty shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My 7th grade son got these in the fall for school (outdoor p.e. daily) and cross country. They held up well and are just now finally wearing out in the fabric on the sides. He is super rough on shoes and while his feet are somewhat particular, these were a great fit. We will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes, UA is his favorite brand even though he is only 9. These shoes will last him through the school year, which is what I want out of them. His UA sneakers/shoes generally last the school year whereas other brands need to be replaced by February or March. We also love the look of these shoes and this color combination (black with red souls and green logo). Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: karen in venice

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but I would like to find replacement laces that match the blue. No Luck Anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: CBrackett

customer_reviews.title: DONT  BUY THESE SHOES.
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable, to narrow and are poor quality. Will not buy underarmor again.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Hollis

customer_reviews.title: great sneakers. I have wide feet and these are ...
customer_reviews.text: great sneakers. I have wide feet and these are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 10. 5 for my husband because that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 10.5 for my husband because that's what he wears. They fit perfectly and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlen D

customer_reviews.title: We will try it and wear it out and hopefully it will be wider otherwise the shoe seems good quality and very
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit tight for the size ordered up. We will try it and wear it out and hopefully it will be wider otherwise the shoe seems good quality and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Natalig

customer_reviews.title: The soles give decent support better than most lower price shoes and reach a happy ...
customer_reviews.text: for 50 dollars Under Armour makes a decent shoe. the shoes have held up decently well considering that I primarily wear them at work and at home for the past 7 moths or so now. The soles give decent support better than most lower price shoes and reach a happy medium between low budget and higher end running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Crap fitting
customer_reviews.text: build quality is good, fitting is terrible. I received the product made in China, crap fitting... without any care..too tight in front. Hurt my toe in first walk.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and have held up extremely well after the last couple months.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are we'll worth the price, will continue to shop exclusively from Under Armour!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Size chart/logo
customer_reviews.text: The logo in the shoe came off with one day of wearing them. Also very tight with sizing for the normal chart
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cage

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff, still have to break in this pair, taking them for a run!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but they are cheap looking for under armour brand.
customer_reviews.author: Great Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great style and great fit.....comfort and they were the size I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for running
customer_reviews.text: Not the best for running because the heel is very high, but great shoes otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Trenton

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Son in law loves these shoes. Look good and feel good. Whats not to love?

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned shoes, did not have an adequate substitute, too small also.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves them. They are very light and helps him in his runs!

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected and he thinks they're really comfortable. I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my boyfriend, he loves them. They fit as expected and he thinks they're really comfortable. I am happy with my purchase. Oh and they look cuter in person :)

customer_reviews.title: These shoe are very good and look great
customer_reviews.text: These shoe are very good and look great. My foot was too wide and I could not wear them
customer_reviews.author: Mini Cooper

customer_reviews.title: That makes me happy.
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband, he likes them. That makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I had not been able to find these in the store for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My son thinks theses are great shoes because they are so light and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks theses are great shoes because they are so light and fit perfect. He wears a size 15 and he said they fit in width and length and are not sloppy in the width or inner sole.
customer_reviews.author: K. R.

customer_reviews.title: I have had under armour's before and the quality was much better. I tore through this pair the third time ...
customer_reviews.text: These did not last as long as I expected. I have had under armour's before and the quality was much better. I tore through this pair the third time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had them for a week and they were great from first day of wear
customer_reviews.text: Had them for a week and they were great from first day of wear. They were a little stiffer then I expected but overall it seems like a quality sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Been running for 2 months and there is already a hole in the top where the cloth is.
customer_reviews.author: Brent W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My partner loves them they fit as expected, just a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour shoes = My new favorites
customer_reviews.text: UA shoes are really, REALLY solid. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: One of three

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling and great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling and great looking shoes! Would highly recommend for casual wearing. I don't use them for runs or regular athletic activity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes I have three pair .. One pair for working ( painting)
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: My everyday walkabout
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, lightweight, decent low cost shoe, comes with ridiculously long shoe laces
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

product_meta.title: Under Armour Thrill 2, Men Running Shoes, Black (Black), 6.5 UK (40.5 EU)
feature_bullets: Breathable Mesh Upper - Provides a breathable environment, keeping the wearer cool and dry.
Midfoot Straps - Adds structure and support without adding extra bulk.
Die-Cut, Full-Length EVA Sockliner - Offers added comfort and provides a custom fit.
Full-Length Micro G Foam - Turns cushioned landings into high-powered take-offs.
Added Cushioning In The Heel - Provides added cushioning from impact.
